1. Patch for dicom standard 2022d
    gdcmDefaultDicts.cxx.patch
    gdcmTagKeywords.h.patch
    gdcmTagToType.h.patch
    gdcmTagToVR.cxx.patch
    gdcmUIDs.cxx.patch
    gdcmUIDs.h.patch
    gdcmVM.h.patch

2. Patch for crash when sending files
    sockstream.cpp.patch
    
* To prevent the git client from tracking changes,
  you can set the properties of the patched files to be assumed unchanged
